#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main (){
    int sz;
    cin>>sz;
int a[sz+2];
int n = 0;
int even = 0;
int odd = 0;
while (n < sz){
    cin>>a[n];
    if (a[n]%2 == 0){
        even++;
    }else{
    odd++;
    }
    n++;
}
if (odd>=even){
    cout<<(odd-even);
}else {
cout<<(even-odd);}

return 0;
}
